name: Sci-Fi Shooter (OddPhishGames)
description:
In a multi-purpose science facility, on a strange planet, a number of rogue androids have broken loose and it's your job to neutralise the threat. Kill all of the androids and avoid getting killed yourself.

This game is my version of Simple Shooter, which I made as part of the "Unreal 5.0 C++ Developer: Learn C++ and Make Video Games" course on GameDev.tv. The course covered some more advanced techniques of using C++ inside of Unreal Engine.
